info.title: FeeOn APIs
info.description: Documentation of All the APIs in FeeOn

get.summary: This API fetches all the list of fee types available with pagination.

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: Account type to filter the types

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of documents to limit number

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: The account type of the feetype

get.summary: This API fetches a single feetype by id.

put.summary: This API updates a single feetype by id.

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: The account type of the feetype

delete.summary: This API deletes a single feetype by id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the feeschedule

parameters.name: scheduleType
parameters.description: The schedule type of the feeschedule

post.summary: This API creates a new feeschedule.

get.summary: This API fetches a feeschedule by id.

put.summary: This API updates a feeschedule by id.

delete.summary: This API deletes a feeschedule by id.

post.summary: This API creates a new feeschedule.

parameters.name: description

parameters.name: schoolId

parameters.name: classes
parameters.description: The classes of students for whom the fee structure is created

parameters.description: The fee details of the fee structure

parameters.name: totalAmount
parameters.description: The total amount of the fee structure
